title: Amazing app! Just one thing‚Ä¶
text: I absolutely love SHEIN! It has so many great clothing picks, and amazing fashion! The jewelry is top notch and there is so much of it!  This is probably my favorite place to find clothes! Other than Old Navy‚Ä¶. It has so many choices along with cheap affordable prices! My mom got me so many cute sweaters and sweatshirts off it for Christmas. I love that the shirts have cute sayings like ‚Äú Back off! I have a big sister and I am not afraid to use her!‚Äù Or ‚Äú Be Kind!‚Äù The earrings are adorable and there are some for all girl ages. The dresses are a great length. They‚Äôre not to short, if you are worried about that‚Ä¶. You can find almost anything that has a cute logo on it! I haven‚Äôt looked at the shoes yet, but I bet they are great! The only thing is that there are crop tops in almost every set of clothes! Even in the 6-7 year old catagory! What is up with that! Even the dresses! I still think the app is great, but think that they need to change that one little problem. Overall I still love SHEIN!

title: DONT USE SHEIN PLEASE
text: Look, I know what you might think about Shein when you first see it. ‚ÄúOh an online shopping app with cheap clothes and good reviews! I‚Äôll buy from them!‚Äù Yea that‚Äôs great and all, but Shein has been hiding the truth from you. While you see all their flashy sales and cheap clothing, you don‚Äôt see all the people shaving their lives away without getting payed hardly anything for you to save a quick buck or two. text: I returned some items and now Shein is not even refunding me properly even though it has been over a whole month now. I tried contacting customer service and still nobody is helping to refund it properly. They just kept repeating the same thing telling me to wait for 7 days after the return was delivered. It has been way over 7 days already. I clearly explained that and provided them with the order number and return proof, and they completely ignored what I was saying and kept repeating the same exact thing. I kept having to explain and they just ignored what I was telling them about how long it was taking. I have tried creating a ticket to contact them 5 times now and I‚Äôm still not getting my refund. They just beat around the bush and are avoiding acknowledging what I‚Äôm saying about how long it‚Äôs taking. The worst part is that they removed live chat from their app so now I have to keep creating tickets over and over again and nobody is helping still. They keep closing the ticket after they are repeating telling me to wait 7 days. It has been 40 days since my return was delivered to them. So they stole my money. I have been repeatedly trying to contact them about this for the last month and still nothing. Horrible!! I will never shop here again! PLEASE DO NOT SHOP AT SHEIN!!!

title: Never received my order

I received about 5 emails and they all were the same automated answer . The same 5 auto emails said‚Äù‚Äù‚Äù. ‚ÄúYour order has been shipped. Track your package . Contact your local post office‚Äù. Wel I tried all that 5 times. And no refund ‚Ä¶ I have been scammed . Since I placed my order., my card has gotten fraud charges on it . Just started since I place my order .
